### 1. **Total Alignment Score (3.333333)**

     \[
     \text{total_score} = \frac{\text{fire engine (object)} + \text{isometric art (other)} + \text{isometric (shape)}}{3} = \frac{1.0 + 0.333333 + 0.0}{3} = 0.444444 \times 3 = 3.333333
